Final Tidy Dataset Data DICTIONARY
(Final Tidy Dataset- average of mean and standard deviation for each measurement for each activity and each subject.)

1  Activity  	
Type of activity performed wearing a smartphone on the waist
Possible Values
	WALKING, 
	WALKING_UPSTAIRS, 
	WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS, 
	SITTING, 
	STANDING, 
	LAYING


2	Subject                         	
The subject who performed the activity for each window sample. Its range is from 1 to 30. 

3	tBodyAcc.mean...X    	
Average of mean values of estimated body acceleration signals along X axis in time domain  

4	tBodyAcc.mean...Y	
Average of mean values of estimated body acceleration signals along Y axis in time domain
